inclusion.criterion: ≥ 18 years of age at the time of screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documented non-ischemic HF with an LVEF ≤ 35
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Recipient of any major organ transplant (e.g., lung, liver, heart)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Receiving or has received cytotoxic or cytostatic chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy for treatment of a malignancy within 6 month before randomization or clinical evidence of current malignancy
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Known to be human immunodeficiency virus positive with an expected survival of less than 5 years due to HIV
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chronic kidney disease with glomerular filtration rate <30 ml/min
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Recent (within 3 months) history of alcohol or illicit drug abuse disorder, based on self-report
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Any condition (e.g., psychiatric illness) or situation that, in the investigator's opinion, could put the subject at significant risk, confound the study results, or interfere significantly with the subject's participation in the study
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Uncorrected congenital heart disease or valve obstruction
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: active vasculitis due to collagen vascular disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Presence on the urgent waiting list for a heart transplant (UNOS category 1A or 1B, or equivalent)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
